tool_description: Gathers property tax assessment records, including assessed values, tax history, exemptions, and assessment methodologies from county assessor databases.

county.description: County name where the property is located

years_back.description: Number of years of tax history to retrieve

error_messages: Invalid property ID: Property ID not found in county assessor records. Verify the property identifier.
County not supported: The specified county is not available in our database. Check county name spelling.
Invalid state code: Use standard two-letter state abbreviations (e.g., CA, NY, TX).
Assessment data unavailable: Tax assessment records are not available for the specified time period.
Years back out of range: years_back must be between 1 and 20.
usage: Provide the property ID, county, and state to retrieve comprehensive tax assessment information. Optionally specify how many years of history to include.

exemptions.description: Active tax exemptions and their values
